bibl.seg: QUENOUILLE Nadine, Some Aspects of the Textile Industry in Roman Egypt.

Mario CAPASSO and Paola DAVOLI (Edd.), New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005 = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 14/2005 (Galatina, 2007) pp. 227-250, 3 tabl.
